alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 9:43PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Vilas and northwestern Oneida Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 943 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Watersmeet to 7 miles south of Turtle Flambeau Flowage to near Phillips. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lac Du Flambeau around 1000 PM CDT. Willow Lake and Squirrel Lake around 1005 PM CDT. Willow Reservoir around 1015 PM CDT. Woodboro and Rainbow Flowage around 1030 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Sayner, Lower Tomahawk River Natural Area, Harshaw, Hazelhurst, Upper Buckatabon Springs Natural Area, Goodnow, Trout Lake, Conover, Lake Tomahawk and Minocqua. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
